title: Carl Zeiss Optical Inc Lens Spray Cleaner (2-ounce Bottle)
feature: Safely and quickly cleans all lenses
Use on eyeglasses, cell phones, laptop screens, cameras, and more!
Safe to clean eyewear with No Glare coating
Zeiss Lens Cleaner spray , 2oz spray bottle, Keep bottles out of reach of children.
Simply Spray on a cloth and gently wipe the lens surface and watch fingerprints, smudges, dirt and oils vanish!
description: This high tech ammonia free formula safely and quickly cleans all lenses and sports optics. Especially designed for anti-reflective, multi-layer coatings. Just spray and wipe dry with soft cloth. Type lens cleaner. Size 2-Ounce.
